TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ParagraphStructure extends System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.SemanticBasicElement implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.NamedElement>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild

Docs.summary: Represents a paragraph in a document.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A ParagraphStructure can be a child of any of these document structure elements:
- <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment>
- <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.SectionStructure>
- <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.TableCellStructure>
- <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListItemStructure>
## Examples The following example shows the `<ParagraphStructure>` part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
[!code-xml[DocumentStructure#DocStructParaStruct2](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/DocumentStructure/Content/FixedPage2_structure.xaml#docstructparastruct2)]

Docs.summary: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfx](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Adds a child object to the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ParagraphStructure>.
Only <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.NamedElement> can be a child of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ParagraphStructure>.

Docs.exception: is not one of the types that can be a child of this class. See **Remarks**.
